data.text: @Gab_H_R @fibromy @StuartDNeilson @FanCpixie 808 people in hospital for things other than Covid. Each one tested and their "positive" results fully dependent upon the fraudulent rtPCR testing regime. Did you know it's been proven that the vaccines kill 130,000 people for every 10,000 they supposedly save? Ask Steve Kirsch.
@PedroNunez @Gab_H_R @FanCpixie Thanks. When I read something so clear, I can not understand why we are not doing the obvious, and still have such extreme community transmission.
@StuartDNeilson @DrMaireadDB @Gab_H_R @FanCpixie @MichealMartinTD @DonnellyStephen @LeoVaradkar @greenparty_ie @CMOIreland We've watched this movie 5 times now and learned nothing!

@PedroNunez @DrMaireadDB @Gab_H_R @FanCpixie @MichealMartinTD @DonnellyStephen @LeoVaradkar @greenparty_ie @CMOIreland There is something wrong when the "cleverest species on Earth" is out-smarted by the sheer replication rate of a simple single-celled organism. We have an abundance of hindsight and foresight, completely over-ridden by politics and social pressure.
"The stupidity of the crowd".
@PedroNunez @Gab_H_R @FanCpixie Is this your image, and do you have a link? It is very clear, thank you.

@Gab_H_R @StuartDNeilson @FanCpixie Not endemicity but altered dis & symptoms
if SARS-CoV-2 evolves 2 infect new human cells, not respiratory system but other organs?  New recombinant coronavirus if SARS2 genetic material combined with existing animal coV virus. Or ADE -dengue or feline infectious peritonitis virus
@Gab_H_R @StuartDNeilson @FanCpixie Vaccine just strategy won't cut it. Every time we let it transmit is a lottery ticket 4 the virus to mutate https://t.co/L1ql1tjTG0
